channel.title: Official Codex Server Team(looking for members)
channel.description:
sign up to be in the team in here
and the Codex website is [url=http://www.tcnetwork.co.uk/forum/index.php]Codex Forums[/url] and the [url=http://www.tcnetwork.co.uk/forum/index.php?topic=399.0]Codex Server Thread[/url]
all coders of the server will be modded and if anyone leaks or keylogs (etc) the server they will be ip banned
and after the server beta is done a hoster position will be open
if you wanna join the team fill out the layout below:
[b]servers you've worked on:[/b] put the servers you've worked on here [b]what you would like to code:[/b] what you can code in the server [b]rate how you code:[/b] rate from 1-10 on how you code [b]what have you coded:[/b] a bit of what you've coded here
[code][b]servers you've worked on:[/b] put the servers you've worked on here [b]what you would like to code:[/b] what you can code in the server [b]rate how you code:[/b] rate from 1-10 on how you code [b]what have you coded:[/b] a bit of what you've coded here[/code]

what have you coded: Helped out about 20 somethen people so far lol, but got no rep++

item.title: Official Codex Server Team(looking for members)
item.dc:creator: @n0vamage n0vamage
item.description:
@n0vamage wrote:

[quote=“dark_child, post:7, topic:36660”][quote author=dirk link=topic=52179.msg642794#msg642794 date=1166439907]
It is a bit annoying So many teams. It gets quite annoying. I mean All the noobs put together teams cos they cant code and they want to own a server. PLEASE stop it
[/quote]your an idiot we’re making a server for the website, we’re not releasing it or anything, and people put together teams…to make the server better, you think would a team of people coding make a better server or would 1 person coding make a better server?[/quote]

im a one man coding team and my server turned out good@

Read full topic
